comments.text: HTML selects (listboxes) should be reasizable as textareas. Sometimes they are ridiculously small and the user needs to scroll too much. It would be easier and more convenient for the user to expand the control and find what he needs rather than do an endless scrolling. That's an UI problem on specific web sites but Firefox could help the users on this way.
